stories.title: Tips for Productivity, Thinking, and Doing

stories.text:
Hi

I would like to know how you usually implement tiers in your SaaS applications and how do you handle the provisioning of features and permissions for users in your services?

Also, how you handle tier/subscription upgrading or downgrading for your users as far as feature management?

Thanks in advance
stories.title: SaaS tier management (features/permissions)

stories.text:
A few years ago I wrote a crawler to fetch all NYC menus. I wanted to prove that many specific dishes can't be found in NYC restaurants.

After more than two years that I had forgotten about the project I decided to clean it up, deal with the css, and put it online.

The number of interesting dishes that can be found is actually quite surprising.

The backend is written using nodejs without any framework (no db, just a bunch of in memory DS) and vanilla js/html/css for the frontend.
stories.title: Show HN: Instant Search in NYC Restaurant Menus
